dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Notification of trademark infraction at http://www.get-insurance-quote.
dmca.body:
T

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
Policy Enforcement
Sent: Monday, March 27, 2006 1:21 PM
To: DMCA
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Notification of trademark infraction at
http://www.get-insurance-quote.info/quote/progressive-car-insurance.html
[IFID:28MY9]]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Notification of trademark infraction at
http://www.get-insurance-quote.info/quote/progressive-car-insurance.html
[IFID:28MY9]
Date:         Mon, 27 Mar 2006 14:19:41 -0500
From:         Legal Administrator <administrator-100@legal-notification.com>
Reply-To:         Legal Administrator
<administrator-100@legal-notification.com>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>




March 27, 2006

Dear Administrative Contact:

I am writing to advise you that you are hosting a site that contains a
trademark violation for my client, Progressive Insurance, a company based in
Mayfield Village, Ohio, U.S.A. I have attempted to remove this infraction by
delivering two notifications of Cease and Desist to the e-mail of record
however the domain owner refuses to remove it.


http://www.get-insurance-quote.info/quote/progressive-car-insurance.html
Site uses Progressive in the URL and diverts traffic to Net Quote

The domain owner of this site is deliberately trying to cause customer
confusion by using Progressive terms to divert web traffic away from
Progressive's website www.progressive.com. This action constitutes trademark
infringement and unfair competition. I am therefore asking for your
assistance in having the domain owner remove all references to Progressive
Insurance from their site.

I hope to hear from you at your earliest convenience.
Sincerely,



Legal Administrator <administrator-100@legal-notification.com>
[IFID:28MY9]
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFEKDsnvK/XpJs6oyURAui6AJwK1Vhn6T7YFr3FqJda+cyY6Jz/jACglOh/
I9r1Du2Z0jusvCmpjnpzoq8=
=4NEX
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
